description: Running perfectly on F34 (if you have the game's CD)

The packaged version 8.0.0 has a broken multiplayer. Using any other version will work fine but the one packaged specifically in the flatpak, as of this writing, will not work with network multiplayer.

Everything else about it works fantastically well. On Debian, use the native .deb version for multiplayer to work.

it says that "game data (/baseq2/ etc.) must be added to: `/.var/app/org.yamagi.YamagiQ2/.yq2/based2/"
It doesn't work ((

Before using Yamagi, you need to have Quake2 (not RTX Q2 as far as i know, not tested yet) After installing yamagi, go to ~/.var/app/org.yamagi.YamagiQ2/.yq2/ and place the whole instalation of Quake2 there
summary: Works fine BUT YOU NEED QUAKE 2's files
